title: Those irrepressible socialists
author: VD
content_html:
They’re at it again. Strange, how these Democratic People’s Republics just keep happening to turn their countries into one charnal house after another. Such a long series of an unaccountable coincidences! We surely don’t want that to happen here. But to stop it elsewhere, we the people cede more power to the central government.

And they say irony is dead.
content_text:
They’re at it
again.   Strange, how these Democratic People’s Republics just keep happening to turn their countries into one charnal house after another.  Such a long series of an unaccountable coincidences!  We surely don’t want that to happen here.  But to stop it elsewhere, we the people cede more power to the central government.
And they say irony is dead.
